meanings.sent1: She made the stupidest mistake by forgetting her keys inside the house.
meanings.sent2: It was the stupidest decision to go out without an umbrella in the rain.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to catch its tail was the stupidest thing I've ever seen.
meanings.sent4: His idea to wear shorts in the snow was the stupidest move of the day.
meanings.sent5: The student's choice to skip studying for the test was the stupidest choice possible.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of good judgment
meanings.sent1: It was the stupidest move to trust a stranger with all her money.
meanings.sent2: His joke about her weight was the stupidest thing he could have said.
meanings.sent3: The decision to paint the house bright pink was the stupidest idea they had.
meanings.sent4: Her choice to walk alone in the dark alley was the stupidest decision she made.
meanings.sent5: The plan to jump off the roof with an umbrella was the stupidest plan ever.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a lack of intelligence or common sense
meanings.sent1: The movie's plot was the stupidest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: His behavior at the party was the stupidest of all the guests.
meanings.sent3: The dog's attempt to chase its own shadow was the stupidest thing witnessed.
meanings.sent4: The idea to swim with sharks was the stupidest adventure they could think of.
meanings.sent5: The decision to wear a winter coat in the scorching heat was the stupidest choice made.
